Instead of eating high-calorie sweets, opt for fruit. If you have a habit of eating chocolate bars, candy and bags of sweetened chips between meals, replace these snacks with your favorite fruits and not only will you start to lose weight.

To chart your progress, take before and after pictures during the course of your diet. This will give you a clear picture of your accomplishment. It's also tangible proof that you can share with others.

Do not eat food too quickly if you desire to lose weight. Try chewing every bite about 20 times, taking smaller bites, and engaging in conversations that are interesting while eating. This helps you feel full more quickly, and you can avoid overeating this way.
